text: @10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson Hi ! I am Raj, Indian national in Philippines.  I want to suggest that you must also appeal to your countrymen to quit smoking.  Smokers are more vulnerable to covid19.  I can't believe even doctors scientists are not advocating this... smoking directly effects lungs.
